author: Sharon Henley
review: I lived at Garden Home Apartments for two years. They are very well maintained units. The grounds are well maintained and the staff is friendly and attentive. Best of all they are pet friendly. At the time I lived there they were one of

author: Tay's K9 Management
review: Great price and pet friendly! A rare site compared to so many other options I've found. Nice area and the staff is super friendly and helpful. I would personally recommend to anyone who has pets and also needs affordable rent.
